title: Learner-Centered Design Strategies for Ensuring Quality in Transnational Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Online Learning Platforms and Understanding of Secondary Education Curriculum
context.additional_context: Enhancing quality management competencies for current secondary school teachers to effectively operate remote classes in global educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners explain the four dimensions of transnational distance education quality elements: accessibility, learner-centered design, socioemotional support, and field applicability
Learners practice designing lessons reflecting the needs of multicultural learner groups through VR simulations
Learners propose evaluation methods for the local applicability of educational content using a peer feedback system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
